channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY

item.title: Report X-2024050500
item.description:
Report X-2024050500

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-14T15:13:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-09
  • City: SYRACUSE
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Repacked hazmat was found with a chlorine smell on the 100 Load side. There was a single canister which appeared to have leaked and powder had collected on the bottom of the box.
